about_the_game:
My name is Julien and I have nothing else to do so I made this game. 🥰
This is a game is an indie game made by a stupid 19-year-old Canadian.😃
This game is very cute and I put a lot of love in it! You will have to earn coins to buy better pet and kill some Yve (They are the rock monster).
You can also find some Bob running every were.
This is a game is a 2D platform game with cute graphics where you can jump, run, kill some mobs and earn coins….. Much more coming soon.
================================================================================================================================
Discord of This is a game :
Come with us on Discord and chat with me and the other player.
Give your ideas and maybe I would add it in the game. 😊

name: This is a game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: This game is not a revolution, but this game is made with a lot of love and not a lot of skills.Play this game with a can of beans and enjoy!!!Discord :
